text:
Hello, good morning! Has anyone else come across their HubSpot blog posts not being indexed? We have a few pages that are being excluded ("Discovered - currently not indexed") but there's nothing preventing the crawler's indexing them in the robots.txt.

Curious if anyone has encountered this?
pages can take months to get indexed on Google, have you requested the url to be indexed in search console?
Yes, we have requested our page to be indexed earlier last month. Is this the most immediate solution for now?
Hi Oscar I would check to make sure they are in the sitemap and it is in the Search Console. Also, make sure you have internal links from other pages that are being indexed.

Good afternoon, We migrated to a HubSpot website recently and since then, Google updates our title tags far more frequently. I've noticed a drop in our CTR as well. Are there any global settings commonly overlooked that impact Title Tags on a HubSpot website?

Outside of HubSpot settings, any tips on how best to fix this?
